name: root
author: HomecareHomebase
description: A plugin to use the Bake IaC deployment system for Azure

scripts.initdev:npm: npm run initdev:npm:base & npm run initdev:npm:tasks
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run initdev && npm run build
scripts.clean:build:lint:test: npm run clean && npm run initdev && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.prod:clean:build: npm run clean && npm run prod:initdev && npm run build
scripts.package: npm run tfx:install && npm run package:tasks
scripts.prod:build:package: prod:clean:build && npm run tfx:install && npm run package:tasks
scripts.package:upload: npm run tfx:install && npm run prod:clean:build && tfx extension publish --root . --share-with ${SHARE_ORG} --token ${ADO_TOKEN} --root . --output-path dist --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --rev-version
